summary: Realistic visuals ENB, based on Opethfeldt ENB and weather system.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]
Please endorse if you like it :)

[img]http://i67.tinypic.com/24fed1x.png[/img]

[youtube]tHpE6-UumJA[/youtube]


[color=#ff0000]DISCLAIMER: All credits should go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18941/?]Opethfieldt[/url] and his amazing ENB and weather system. I only edited the ENB settings, so for complete installation downloading his files is required![/color]


[/size][img]http://i65.tinypic.com/25ppy89.png[/img]



1. Go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18941/?]Opethfieldt[/url] site and install as instructed
2. Download Ultimate Immersion Legendary ENB
3. Extract the files in your Skyrim folder and replace everything when asked
4. Follow my [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4TPE8_x9b0]mod guide[/url] and [url=https://youtu.be/koQq5c7vB48]installation tutorial
[/url]5. [url=https://youtu.be/koQq5c7vB48]Download [/url]my .ini files and replace them in [u]Documents\My Games\skyrim[/u] folder


[size=5]
[/size][img]http://i65.tinypic.com/2uf8yhe.png[/img][/center][center]

[youtube]A4TPE8_x9b0[/youtube]
